snippet: Lionel Messi pushed his goals total to 86 this year with two more scores in Barcelona's win at Real Betis on Sunday, breaking Gerd Muller's 40-year-old record.
abstract: Lionel Messi pushed his goals total to 86 this year with two more scores in Barcelona's win at Real Betis on Sunday, breaking Gerd Muller's 40-year-old record.
